languages.text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Кассия удивленно поднимает глаза-рубины, вглядывается в пустоту за вашими плечами.{/n} "Вокруг вас вспыхивает и затухает столь много цветастых искр. Отнюдь не капля — целое море эмоций! Так много, что мне с трудом удается разобрать белоснежную честность ваших слов".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Кассия удивленно поднимает глаза-рубины, вглядывается в пустоту за вашими плечами.{/n} "Вокруг вас вспыхивает и затухает столь много цветастых искр. Отнюдь не капля — целое море эмоций! Так много, что мне с трудом удается разобрать белоснежную честность ваших слов".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

Отнюдь не капля — целое море эмоций! Так много, что мне с трудом удается разобрать белоснежную честность ваших слов".

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia blickt überrascht auf. Ihre rubinroten Augen starren auf das, was sie hinter dir sieht.{/n} "So viele bunte Funken blitzen hinter Euch auf und verblassen wieder. Es ist ein wahrer Ozean der Emotionen! Es sind so viele, dass ich kaum die reine weiße Aufrichtigkeit Eurer Worte sehen kann."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia blickt überrascht auf. Ihre rubinroten Augen starren auf das, was sie hinter dir sieht.{/n} "So viele bunte Funken blitzen hinter Euch auf und verblassen wieder. Es ist ein wahrer Ozean der Emotionen! Es sind so viele, dass ich kaum die reine weiße Aufrichtigkeit Eurer Worte sehen kann."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}s'étonne Cassia en relevant la tête, ses yeux rubis fixant ce qu'elle voit derrière vous.{/n} « Il y a tant d'étincelles colorées qui s'embrasent et s'éteignent autour de vous. C'est un véritable océan d'émotions ! Il y en a tellement que je parviens à peine à voir la sincérité d'un blanc pur de vos paroles. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}s'étonne Cassia en relevant la tête, ses yeux rubis fixant ce qu'elle voit derrière vous.{/n} « Il y a tant d'étincelles colorées qui s'embrasent et s'éteignent autour de vous. C'est un véritable océan d'émotions ! Il y en a tellement que je parviens à peine à voir la sincérité d'un blanc pur de vos paroles. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人？”{n}卡西娅惊讶地抬起头来，红宝石似的眼睛盯着你身后的某处。{/n}“你的周围闪烁着五彩斑斓的光芒，时而炽亮，时而暗淡。你的情感多么丰沛！我几乎无法从中分辨出代表真诚的纯白。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？”{n}卡西娅惊讶地抬起头来，红宝石似的眼睛盯着你身后的某处。{/n}“你的周围闪烁着五彩斑斓的光芒，时而炽亮，时而暗淡。你的情感多么丰沛！我几乎无法从中分辨出代表真诚的纯白。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}カシアは驚いて見上げる。彼女のルビーの瞳は、あなたの背後にあるものを見ている。{/n}「たくさんの色とりどりの火花があなたの周囲で生まれて燃え上がり、そして色あせていきます。これは感情の大海のように！本当にたくさんあるので、あなたの言葉が持つ純白の誠実さが、かすんで見えるほどです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}カシアは驚いて見上げる。彼女のルビーの瞳は、あなたの背後にあるものを見ている。{/n}「たくさんの色とりどりの火花があなたの周囲で生まれて燃え上がり、そして色あせていきます。これは感情の大海のように！本当にたくさんあるので、あなたの言葉が持つ純白の誠実さが、かすんで見えるほどです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}Cassia levanta la vista sorprendida, con sus ojos rubíes fijos en lo que ve detrás de ti.{/n} «Tantas chispas de colores cobran vida y se apagan a su alrededor. Es todo un océano de emociones. Son tantas que apenas puedo ver la blanca sinceridad de sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

Es todo un océano de emociones. Son tantas que apenas puedo ver la blanca sinceridad de sus palabras».

languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Cassia, şaşkınlıkla sana bakıyor. Yakut gibi gözleri, senin arkanda gördüklerine odaklanmış hâlde.{/n} "Etrafındaki renk renk sayısız kıvılcım, bir alevlenip hayat buluyor bir sönüyor. Bir duygu okyanusundasın âdeta! O kadar fazlalar ki sözlerinin bembeyaz içtenliğini güçlükle seçebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia looks up in surprise, her ruby eyes staring at what she sees behind you.{/n} "So many colourful sparks are flaring to life and dimming all around you. It is a veritable ocean of emotions! There are so many of them that I can barely see the pure-white sincerity of your words."
